description: I worked in a E-Procurement Web Application. This project was outsourced to Jalasoft and I was one of the engineers assigned to that team.

A Full Stack Development Specialization in which I worked on an internal project for Fundacion Jala. I developed a Micro Frontend with React JS using Material UI and a MicroServices based backend with SpringBoot in Java
A Small Tic-Tac-Toe implementation done during my Fundacion Jala type. Mainly done to play with CSS. (I agree, It's ugly)
